user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement multi-factor authentication and role-based access to ensure secure and personalized user access.
epics.description: Develop a secure login system leveraging multi-factor authentication (MFA) and session management to safeguard user access. Enforce role-based access control (RBAC) to ensure users only view data and services appropriate to their customer type and authorization level. Integrate with the bank's identity management systems to support centralized policies, password recovery, and user access auditing. All authentication and access mechanisms must adhere to financial data protection and regulatory compliance requirements.

epics.title: Personalized Banking Dashboard
epics.summary: Design a dynamic, user-friendly dashboard tailored to each customer’s profile and eligibility.
epics.description: Build a modern, responsive dashboard that displays key banking products and services relevant to the user’s profile, such as accounts, loans, investments, and credit cards. The dashboard should highlight active services, available offers, and pending interactions in real time. Implement a simple navigation structure and responsive interface for optimal use across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices, supporting both accessibility and performance standards.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Streamline workflows for new account openings and service modification requests.
epics.description: Develop user-friendly self-service workflows for submitting new account requests, product enrollments, and service modifications. Minimize user input by pre-filling known profile information and validating data instantly. Each workflow should guide users step-by-step, with clear status updates and built-in submission validation. Ensure seamless integration with back-office systems for approval routing and fulfillment tracking.

epics.title: Application Drafts and Document Management
epics.summary: Allow users to save incomplete applications and securely upload required documentation.
epics.description: Implement functionality enabling users to save applications in progress and return later to complete them. Include secure file upload capabilities supporting multiple document types such as ID proofs, income statements, and address verification. Provide options to view and manage previously submitted documents. Apply robust data encryption during upload, storage, and retrieval to ensure data confidentiality and compliance.

epics.title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time request tracking and automated notifications for transparency and engagement.
epics.description: Develop an event-driven tracking system that allows customers to monitor the progress of submitted account or service requests in real time. Implement email and in-portal notifications for updates such as submission confirmation, approval, rejection, or additional information required. Allow users to configure notification preferences and maintain a central notification history accessible through the dashboard.

epics.title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Log
epics.summary: Maintain a complete record of customer interactions within the portal.
epics.description: Store and display a detailed interaction history, including requests submitted, actions taken, communications, and document uploads. Provide filtering options for users to easily search past activities. Maintain immutable audit logs for compliance and operational transparency. Ensure audit data integration with bank-wide governance and risk management systems while adhering to data retention policies.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Enable seamless bidirectional integration with the bank’s core systems.
epics.description: Develop secure APIs and middleware services to synchronize data between the self-service portal and the core banking system. Ensure real-time data consistency for account balances, transactions, customer details, and service requests. Incorporate failover and retry mechanisms to maintain reliability and prevent data loss. Design the integration to support high-volume transaction processing with minimal latency while maintaining full auditability.

epics.title: Independent Portal Database and Performance Layer
epics.summary: Implement an independent database architecture to ensure optimal portal performance.
epics.description: Create a dedicated database for the self-service portal optimized for fast retrieval, caching, and concurrent user access. Establish synchronization jobs with the bank’s core systems using event-driven or scheduled data updates. Implement monitoring and scaling mechanisms to ensure high availability and consistent performance under load without impacting core banking operations.

epics.title: Responsive and Accessible User Experience Design
epics.summary: Deliver a consistent, accessible, and responsive user interface across all devices.
epics.description: Build a unified design system ensuring the portal adapts seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Comply with accessibility standards such as WCAG to accommodate all user demographics. Ensure fast load times, consistent branding, intuitive navigation, and modern interaction patterns. Incorporate usability testing and continuous UI enhancements based on customer feedback.

epics.title: Data Security and Regulatory Compliance
epics.summary: Ensure end-to-end security of financial data and adherence to banking compliance standards.
epics.description: Implement data encryption for information in transit and at rest, along with robust key management. Enforce privacy and protection measures aligned with regulatory standards such as GDPR, PCI DSS, and local banking laws. Conduct vulnerability testing and penetration assessments regularly. Ensure customer data segregation for compliance, and document all security controls for regulatory audits.

epics.title: Monitoring, Scalability, and Reliability Framework
epics.summary: Optimize performance and introduce continuous monitoring for system health and scalability.
epics.description: Implement application and infrastructure monitoring to track performance metrics, downtime, and error rates. Use auto-scaling and load balancing to handle peak login and transaction volumes efficiently. Provide proactive incident monitoring and alerting to system administrators. Enable regular performance audits to ensure the platform remains resilient and responsive under varying workloads.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication for User Security
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to use multi-factor authentication, so that I can ensure the security of my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must comply with regulatory requirements, support multiple authentication methods, ensure seamless user experience.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can choose from multiple authentication methods.
2. System prompts for MFA during login.
test_cases: Given a user is trying to log in, When they enter their credentials, Then the system should prompt for an additional authentication factor.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Enforce Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to enforce role-based access control, so that users can only access data and services appropriate to their authorization levels.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Roles must be managed centrally, enforce least privilege, and be compliant with regulatory standards.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can only access data and services assigned to their roles.
2. Administrators can manage and assign roles.
test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, When they attempt to access restricted data, Then the system should deny access.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Integrate with Centralized Identity Management Systems
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want to integrate with centralized identity management systems, so that we can maintain consistent and secure user policies across the platform.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integration should support password recovery, centralized policy enforcement, and provide user access audit logs.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can recover passwords through the identity management system.
test_cases: Given identity management integration, When a user forgets their password, Then they should be able to recover it through the centralized system.

user_stories.title: Design User-Specific Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can view banking products and services relevant to my profile.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should dynamically adjust to user profile, highlight active services, and include real-time updates.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard displays user-specific services and offers.
2. Updates are shown in real time.
test_cases: Given a user profile, When the user logs in, Then the dashboard should display products relevant to that user.

user_stories.title: Implement Responsive and Accessible Design
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the dashboard to be accessible and responsive, so that I can use it effectively across all devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must comply with WCAG standards, provide optimal performance on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard adapts to different device screen sizes.
test_cases: Given a user accessing the dashboard on a mobile device, When the screen size changes, Then the dashboard should adjust accordingly.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Self-Service Account Opening Workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an easy-to-follow workflow for opening a new account, so that I can complete the process quickly and efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflow should pre-fill known information, validate data instantly, and guide users step-by-step.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Known information is pre-filled in the application form.
test_cases: Given a user initiating a new account request, When the user inputs data, Then the system should validate the data instantly.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Service Modification Workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a guided workflow for modifying my existing services, so that I can make changes smoothly with clear status updates.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflow should provide clear status updates and ensure integration with back-office systems for tracking and validation.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users receive clear status updates during the modification process.
2. Changes are integrated with the back-office system for tracking.
test_cases: Given a user modifying a service, When they submit the modification request, Then they should receive status updates.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture shows the banking self-service portal using various Azure services for frontend, authentication, backend services, database, integration, notifications, monitoring, security, access control, and DevOps, ensuring user-friendly design, security, and seamless integration.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture has been enhanced to address critical security and reliability gaps by adding a Web Application Firewall (WAF) and placeholder nodes for disaster recovery. All nodes and edges have been validated, and the structure adheres to ReactFlow standards with no missing or duplicate elements. The architecture now better aligns with Azure Well-Architected Framework principles, achieving a high-quality rating.
